
get-object-acl
**************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Returns the access control list (ACL) of an object.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws s3 get-object-acl
     --bucket <value>
     --key <value>
     [--version-id <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--bucket"  (string)

"--key"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--version-id"  (string)--version-id used to reference a specific
version of the object.
